item.title: gst-plugins-base 0.10.5 'Net' released
item.description:
GStreamer Base Plug-ins is a well-groomed and well-maintained collection of GStreamer plug-ins and elements, spanning the range of possible types of elements one would want to write for GStreamer. It also contains helper libraries and base classes useful for writing elements. A wide range of video and audio decoders, encoders, and filters are included. @en

See a list of plug-ins and elements in this module's release.

Read the release notes or download gst-plugins-base-0.10.5.tar.bz2 or gst-plugins-base-0.10.5.tar.gz.

item.title: gstreamer 0.10.4 'Light' released
item.description:
GStreamer is a streaming media framework that allows the construction of graphs of elements which operate on media data. Applications using this library can do anything from real-time sound processing over playing video to capturing audio, video, and even other types of media data. Its architecture allows for adding new data types or processing capabilities simply by installing new plug-ins. GStreamer is the core module, containing libraries, headers, the basic object hierarchy, and a set of media-agnostic core elements. @en

See a list of plug-ins and elements in this module's release.

Read the release notes or download gstreamer-0.10.4.tar.bz2 or gstreamer-0.10.4.tar.gz.

item.title: gst-plugins-good 0.10.2 'Papa was a rolling stone' released
item.description:
GStreamer Good Plug-ins is a set of plug-ins that we consider to have good quality code and correct functionality, under our preferred license (LGPL for the plug-in code, LGPL or LGPL-compatible for the supporting library). @en

See a list of plug-ins and elements in this module's release.

Read the release notes or download gst-plugins-good-0.10.2.tar.bz2 or gst-plugins-good-0.10.2.tar.gz.
